title: Hoops Tonight- Kevin Durant gives Nets ultimatum, how should Brooklyn respond?
itunes:title: Hoops Tonight- Kevin Durant gives Nets ultimatum, how should Brooklyn respond?
description:
Jason Timpf reacts to news of Kevin Durant telling Nets owner Joseph Tsai that he needs to choose between Durant or the pairing of general manager Sean Marks and head coach Steve Nash. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
